abstract.t: The Layer Two Tunneling Protocol (L2TP) [1] provides a standardmethod for transporting the link layer of PPP [2] between a dial-upserver and a Network Access Server, using a network connection inlieu of a physical point to point connection. This documentdescribes the use of an ATM network for the underlying networkconnection. Both ATM UNI [3] with ATM Adaptation Layer 5 [4](AAL5) and ATM with Frame based User-to-Network Interface (FUNI)[5] are supported as interfaces to the ATM network.
